name: Zen Chess Collection
description:
Zen Chess Collection is the combination of 6 minimalist chess puzzle games. Solve 900 carefully selected puzzles in a beautifully designed chess board.

- Designed for chess lovers of all levels (even if you just learned how to move the pieces);
- Enjoy a minimalist, beautifully designed chess board and pieces;
- Original soundtrack, specially composed to help you keep your focus and concentration;
- Everything in the game was made with a lot of love and craftsmanship;

Includes all six games from the Zen Chess series:

- Zen Chess: Mate in One - Solve 300 carefully selected mate-in-one puzzles
- Zen Chess: Mate in Two - Solve 150 carefully selected mate-in-two puzzles
- Zen Chess: Mate in Three - Solve 100 carefully selected mate-in-three puzzles
- Zen Chess: Mate in Four - Solve 50 carefully selected mate-in-four puzzles
- Zen Chess: Blindfold Masters - Put your memory and chess skills to the test by solving 150 puzzles without seeing the pieces.
- Zen Chess: Champion’s Moves - Play through 150 historical games and solve the same chess problems the Champions had to solve to win each game.

Can you find the moves that solve each puzzle? Give it a try and show yourself you are a truly chess master.
